channel.title: Guy Smoking
channel.description:
I got bored today and i made this lol ;D ;D
[IMG]http://i428.photobucket.com/albums/qq3/dave_02_2008/GuySmoking.jpg[/img]
and BTW the fang is 100% SilentCJ's lol i waas bored at the time.
it was fun becaae i made it 5 mins ago and it took about 5 min to make lol
i just took the guy from RSMV and i downloaded the fang form SilentCJ lol
and just put it together. :P

item.title: Guy Smoking
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

we dont need 5 minute models that have no meaning what so ever, if you were to add this to a client, i doubt it would even look like something none the less looking like a gray spot on the screen.

Don’t post something you havent worked hard on.

Read full topic

item.title: Guy Smoking
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“ak226688, post:7, topic:283304”][quote author=Newty link=topic=374375.msg2823182#msg2823182 date=1244768154]

lock

If you want it locked, post a valid reason.
[/quote]theres no point in this topic he didnt do anything to the model[/quote]You’re quite wrong there.
He did add some smoke.
But for the rest of it it’s a [u]100% Recolour.

@@Newty, His way of recolouring is against the rules.
Altough recolouring isn’t against the rules [u]IF he has permission of the respectfull owner/creator which is Jagex Ltd. , and i am sure that they would [u]Not give him the permission to [u]Recolour their 3d model.
Reason enough to lock and delete this topic if you ask me.

Read full topic
